name: Access Bank SL Limited
description: Access Bank Sierra Leone, established in 2019, is a member of the Access Bank Group, providing financial services to individuals, businesses, and communities in Sierra Leone. They offer a range of services including savings accounts, loans, and digital banking solutions, and are committed to the economic development of the country.

name: Aptech Africa Limited
description: Aptech Africa Limited is a leading provider of renewable energy solutions in Sierra Leone, offering solar panels, water heaters, pumps, and lighting systems. They are committed to providing affordable and reliable energy solutions that help customers reduce energy costs and protect the environment.

name: Atlantic Lumley Hotel
description: Atlantic Lumley Hotel is a luxury hotel in Lumley, Freetown, offering comfortable rooms, fine dining, conference facilities, and recreational activities. Committed to exceptional hospitality, they aim to create memorable experiences for their guests.

name: Balmed Holdings Limited
address: 2 Africanus Road, Kissy Freetown, Sierra Leone
description: Balmed Holdings Limited is a leading distributor of pharmaceutical and healthcare products in Sierra Leone, offering pharmaceuticals, medical supplies, laboratory equipment, and healthcare services. They are committed to providing high-quality products and services to improve public health.

name: Bboxx SL Ltd
description: Bboxx SL Ltd is a leading provider of solar home systems in Sierra Leone, offering solar panels, batteries, and appliances for clean and affordable energy solutions. They are committed to providing reliable and sustainable energy to improve quality of life and protect the environment.

name: Africell SL Ltd
description: Africell SL Ltd is a leading telecommunications company in Sierra Leone, providing mobile voice and data services, mobile money, and value-added services. They are committed to offering affordable and reliable telecommunications solutions to help customers stay connected and access information.

name: Bennimix Food Co Ltd.
description: Bennimix Food Co Ltd. is a leading manufacturer of food products in Sierra Leone, offering flour, pasta, rice, and other food items made with high-quality ingredients. They are committed to providing nutritious and affordable food products to improve public health.
